column5: How I managed to regain my intellect which seemed to have been destroyed by depression: supplements. Double the recommended dosage. Ginseng. Vitamin C. Magnesium. Multivitamins + minerals. Iron supplement (never with tea) Homeopathy: Kali phosphoricum 15ch 3 times a day. Homemade smoothies for breakfast. No coffee, only decaf. Very clean diet. No meat but some fish. Walks. Breathing exercises. Light yoga. NO ANTIDEPRESSANTS FROM DOCTOR. It f...s you up even more. With love.
